ruleset.name: Custom ruleset
ruleset.description: A custom ruleset based on PMD's Quickstart rules. This ruleset is a good starting point for any Java project. It focuses on: - Best Practices: Enforcing conventions and avoiding suboptimal code. - Code Style: Maintaining a consistent and readable codebase. - Design: Finding issues related to object-oriented design. - Error Prone: Detecting potential bugs and sources of errors. - Multithreading: Highlighting potential concurrency issues. - Performance: Identifying inefficient code that can be optimized. - Security: Finding common security vulnerabilities.
